Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
That same conversation happened at the supermarket too.
I can't go to that shopping street for a while because of how awkward it is.
...Well, I guess it's because they say cats are cute.
[Vanilla]: "Huh? Kun-kun, kun-kun..."
[Vanilla]: "There's a really nice smell coming from over there."
[Chocola]: "Really, it smells so good and pleasant, Master!"
[Kashou Minaduki]: "Indeed. This scent is..."
Turns one's face towards the direction of the smell.
[Street Cat at Food Stall]: "Welcome to our stall!"
[Street Cat at Food Stall]: "How about some freshly made takoyaki? What do you think?"
[Street Cat at Food Stall]: "It's hot and full of katsuobushi, how does it taste?"
[Chocola]: "Wow, a cat takoyaki shop! That's unusual, Master!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "Try to be a good girl!"
[Vanilla]: "Shigure, it's tough. But thanks to you, I've learned many things."
[Shopkeeper]: "Is that so? You have a good master, huh?"
[Chocola]: "Ah, but Mr. Master is still Mr. Master!"
[Chocola]: "And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Mr. Master?"
[Vanilla]: "As an interpreter, Shigure is a precious friend."
[Vanilla]: "Calling 'master' is only for our master here."
[Shopkeeper]: "Ahaha. You're loved, aren't you, Mr. Master?"
[Kashou]: "Well, it's quite fortunate."
He gets lightly prodded with an elbow.
He responds with a shy smile.
...It's a bit embarrassing outside.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure gazes at the cell phone ringing with a merciless electronic sound.
... I thought things would settle down just by contacting Shigure.

[Chocola]: "Hamu, nngungun-gun-gun, breakfast is delicious isn't it?"
[Chocola]: "Master's breakfast is always delicious nya~"

[Vanilla]: "Chocola, your cheeks have ketchup on them."
[Vanilla]: "Cute in an artistic way. I'll lick them clean. PEROPERO."

The characters themselves are happily munching on sandwiches.
By the way, the filling consists of tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
And it's a simple one with half-cooked egg stuffed in between.
It must be something like this for breakfast.

[Kashou]: "You guys, make sure to go home today, alright?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
A cheerful smile as the receipt and pen are handed over.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Yes, um..."
Re-examining the received receipt.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...It seems like it might be something different from what I ordered though."
[Plate Supplier]: "...Really?"
[Plate Supplier]: "Is it that the product is different... perhaps?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "No, it looks like everything I ordered is in there... but..."
Gazing at the stacks of cardboard boxes piled inside the store.
A mountain, a mountain, a mountain of small cardboard boxes piled up inside the store.
Almost the entire store was filled with cardboard boxes.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "As you can see, we don't need this many plates here in our shop..."
[Plate Supplier]: "S-sorry! I will check with our headquarters immediately!"
[Plate Supplier]: "Would it be alright if you wait a little while?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
**Food Utensil Supplier:** "It seems to be a mistake on our part, mixed with another order... I assume Master Minaduki will also need these soon..."

**Food Utensil Supplier:** "If it's not too much trouble, I would like for you to receive the dishes ordered..."

**Minaduki Kashou:** "Receive the ordered dishes..."

**Minaduki Kashou:** "...Huh? From this pile?"

A towering stack of boxes rises.
Words get stuck in his throat.
All are identical boxes after all.
Until he opens them, there's no telling what's inside.
Moreover, looking at the receipts, they're all top-tier tea sets and tableware.
So, one must be extremely careful with how these are handled; otherwise, it could lead to unthinkable consequences.

**Minaduki Kashou:** "Ah, yes, indeed there is preparation for opening. I would be delighted if I could get these today..."

**Minaduki Kashou:** "...But isn't this going to take quite a bit of time right now?"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou: "…If I could just live as simply as a cat, everything would be so much easier, though."

He glanced at the shop name plastered on the window and shook off his bitter smile before starting to put away the tea set that had just arrived.

SPEAKER_NAME: Vanilla: "That's right, the takoyaki stall from yesterday isn't here today."

It was the same time in the evening as yesterday at the park street. But today, there wasn't a single stall to be found. No one was around to send the cats back home today, and I had even left my house key behind.

So until Shigure comes back home, I'll have to adjust my schedule for shopping.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you take a little break?"
[Chocola]: "Ah, yes, just for a moment..."
[Chocola]: "But it's okay. I'm sorry to worry you, Master."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...You don't need to apologize or anything"
Bows with a puzzled smile.
He understands the reason for her lack of energy.
So there's nothing else he can do but stay silent.
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Well then, since there's a bench right over there, why don't you take a break?"
[Vanilla]: "Then I'll go buy something to drink."
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah, please do. For everyone."
[Vanilla]: "Understood. I have been entrusted with this task."
Hands over some money to Chocola and encourages her to sit on the bench.
The strong sea breeze that cuts through well stirs the leaves of the trees in the park.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のお陰様で、予想以上に客足が伸びたこともあるけどな」
[時雨]: 「あら何のことでしょう？」
俺がそれ以上は追求しないことにすると、
時雨も小さく笑って首を傾げて応える。
素直に答えるくらいなら直接言ってるだろうし。
そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
[Master]: "Thanks to Shigure, there have been times when the number of customers exceeded our expectations."
[Shigure]: "What's that all about?"
If I don't pursue it further,
Shigure also responds with a small smile and tilts her head.
She would probably just answer straightforwardly if she were asked directly.
Such behavior is also part of Shigure's nature from long ago.
[Shigure]: "I understand what you're saying, brother."
[Shigure]: "But cats are intelligent children. They can become family members or partners to humans too."
[Shigure]: "...That's why"
Then she takes a moment to pause,
looking at me with a troubled smile.
[Shigure]: "...I think it would be lonely if you couldn't rely on yourself too?"
Her smile pierces my heart.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
SHE furrows her brows, looking at the screen of her phone.
She gazes at Shigure who doesn't move and infers where the call is from.
[Kashou]: "It's from home, isn't it? You should hurry out."
[Shigure]: "...I understand. I came out without saying where I'm going because..."
The phone in Shigure's hand stops ringing.
Just like before, Shigure remains silent and tightly grips her phone.
[Shigure]: "...Am I still just a girl not yet of age?"
[Shigure]: "Or am I just a child who doesn't know the world?"
[Shigure]: "...So, should I follow what my father and mother say?"
[Shigure]: "...I want to be here."
[Shigure]: "...At least, when you're in pain... I'd like to at least be by your side."

reference_answer:

[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.

Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
From the morning, my head has been caught up with unexpected sights.
[Shigure]: "Good morning, brother"
[Shigure]: "I have been thinking about various things regarding this matter."
A bright smile without a trace of cloudiness.
The other cats are also directing their smiles at me.
Then, I can feel the cold sweat running down my spine,
[Kashou]: "Haa... Thinking about what exactly..."
I somehow manage to say only that much.
[Shigure]: "It became clear that it was unreasonable for me to burden you with this matter."
[Shigure]: "However, it is also a fact that I have been worried enough to sleepless nights as your sister..."
[Shigure]: "So, I thought that increasing the personnel and reducing your burden would be the best solution."
[Kashou]: "…………Haa"

reference_answer:

[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」

[Cinnamon]: 「Fantastic~ Absolutely fantastic, May-chan~♪ Cinnamon is drooliiiing~...!」

Question:

[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」

Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
**SPEAKER_NAME: Shocola**: "It's lovely, master~!"
**SPEAKER_NAME: Vanilla**: "Good."
**SPEAKER_NAME: Azuki**: "Well, since I helped out, I guess it's okay to see the finished product though."
**SPEAKER_NAME: Maple**: "You're really putting your heart into this."
**SPEAKER_NAME: Cinnamon**: "Oh, it smells so good~... slurp"
**SPEAKER_NAME: Coconut**: "It's amazing... too cute. I can't help but eat it!"
**SPEAKER_NAME: Awayuki**: "Really. It's such a waste to cut into it."
**SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure**: "I understand, Mother!"
**SPEAKER_NAME: Awayuki**: "Of course?"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Maple: "I can't eat it if you don't cut it, so I'll do it myself."
SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "Yes, that's true. There's no other way, go ahead and do it, Maple."
SPEAKER_NAME: Maple: "Sak-sa-ku-saku, then!"
Maple inserts a knife into the cake and quickly cuts it up.
SPEAKER_NAME: Awayuki: "Ah..."
SPEAKER_NAME: Awayuki: "It's something. The cats too seem very accustomed to it. They handle knives like pros."
SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "You work at the store, so you're already a pro, Mom."
SPEAKER_NAME: Awayuki: "Oh, that's right! Ufu... It does look reassuring."
When the cake was cut up, just then—
From the entrance, the sound of a door opening can be heard.
SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "Eh!?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Awayuki: "Ah, this way of opening is Dad's. It seems like he came home early today."

Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I tense up and stand firm.
The cats also hold their breath.
[Shuhama]: "…………hm"
This man is my father—Minaduki Shuhama.
[Shigure]: "Um, Father... I thought tonight was supposed to be a Chamber of Commerce gathering..."
[Shuhama]: "That's true, but... would it be inconvenient when I return home?"
[Shigure]: "No, that wouldn't..."
[Chocola]: "An! Master's father is back!"
[Vanilla]: "Master's father returns earlier than expected."
[Coconut]: "Welcome home, Father!"

[Shuhama]: "Hmm"
[Maple]: "......This might be bad, huh?"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
[Awayuki]: "I was so happy. It's been a while since it's been this lively."

[Awayuki]: "Father, how about you sit down? Kashou's cake looks delicious, doesn't it?"

[Shigure]: "Ah, yes! Father, please eat your brother's cake today!"

[Shigure]: "If you try it, you'll know that my brother is really putting his heart into it!"

I couldn't help but gulp. Would my father actually eat the cake I made? What would he say?

[Chocola]: "Agreed! If everyone tries the delicious cake from our master, we'll all get along better!"

[Vanilla]: "No doubt about it."

[Coconut]: "Mm-hmm! Your brother's cake is really delicious!"

Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.

屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。

[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.

Question:
って、そんなわけあるか！いくら俺でも、妹のことを見間違えたりはしない。
[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ、時雨……？」
[時雨]: 「……見つかってしまいましたか。兄様」
[時雨]: 「現地の人たちに、完璧に溶けこんだつもりだったのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」

SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou (Master) "No... even in Paris, seeing someone dressed like a noblewoman isn't common..."
Paris is full of cobblestone paths and many staircases, which can be dangerous for high heels. Many women wear sneakers or leather boots.

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hmm...」
The fact that we're talking right now is already so far removed from my initial plans, though...
Then again, maybe the reason I'm feeling this way is because my mental composure is wearing thin?
Shigure felt worried enough about me to come all the way to France. Even though she has her own life to lead.
Nonetheless, I'm not even mature enough to be forthright and give her my thanks.

[Beignet]: 「...I see.」
[Kashou]: 「He also said that my cooking lacks a 'core'. I think he means a 'main part', like an 'axis' or a 'nucleus' in other things.」

[Beignet]: 「I'm not sure what this 'core' your father speaks of is, either.」

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そう思います。父親は頑固で口下手だけど……認めたくないからって嘘を言うような人じゃない」

[嘉祥]: 「はい……」
おそらく、俺には足りないものがある。

しかし、言葉で説明できるようなものではない。

悩んでしまい、また思考がぐるぐると頭の中を回った。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「That's what I think, too. Dad is hardheaded and terrible with words, but... he's not the kind of person to lie just because he doesn't approve of something.」
[Beignet]: 「There is some meaning behind him not explaining himself. You realize that, at least?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, somewhat.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, I can't teach you anything. You realize that as well?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes...」
I'm guess there's something I'm missing.
Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no! I cannot go back until I find something—anything.」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou, "I think so. My father is stubborn and not good with words, but... he's not the kind of person who would lie because he doesn't want to admit something."
SPEAKER_NAME: Beignet, "There seems to be a reason you didn't explain it. You understand that, right?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou, "Yeah, probably."
SPEAKER_NAME: Beignet, "Then I can't teach you. Can you understand that too?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou, "Yes..."
Perhaps, there's something lacking in me.
And both my father and mentor understand it.
But it's not something that can be explained with words.
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou, "Ugh..."
I'm troubled and my thoughts keep spinning around in my head.
SPEAKER_NAME: Beignet, "Didn't I say I'm of no use? Should you return to the country already?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou, "Ah, no! I can't go back unless I find something."

メインディッシュの肉料理のあと――師匠のケーキが、テーブルに並べられた。

[Beignet]: 「Do so, please. Now, I'm pretty proud of this one, too. I want you to enjoy it.」
After the main meat dish comes... slices of Mentor's cake, which line the table.

[Fraise]: 「Your cakes are always so pretty, but today's cakes are special... and I can really feel your joy from them, Pâtissière.」
[Beignet]: 「Really? That's great.」

Question:
そのケーキは新作で、初めて食べる味だったが、間違いなく師匠の味で……
新鮮なのに懐かしかった。
[嘉祥]: 「……これを食べに、この街へと来たような気がします」
[ベニエ]: 「少しは落ちついたかしら？」

[嘉祥]: 「お恥ずかしいかぎりです」
[嘉祥]: 「正直、お店の手伝いをしているときは、こんなことしている場合なのか？って気持ちも、少しはあったんです」
[嘉祥]: 「俺、クリスマスまでに、父親を納得させるケーキを作らなきゃいけないのに――って」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、働いているうちに、昔の気持ちを思い出せたというか」
[嘉祥]: 「洋菓子を作りたいと思った、最初の頃の想いが、よみがえってきて」
reference_answer:
The cake is a new recipe that I've never tasted before, but the flavor definitely belongs to my mentor...
It's a fresh yet nostalgic taste.
[Kashou]: 「...I feel like I've come to this city for the sole purpose of eating this.」
[Beignet]: 「Has it calmed you down a little?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know, but... was I that bad?」
[Beignet]: 「You had the face of a lost kitten.」
[Kashou]: 「Color me embarrassed.」
[Kashou]: 「Honestly, when I was helping with the shop today, I did kind of ask myself, 'Should I really be doing this right now?'」
[Kashou]: 「I thought, 'I should be baking the cake that'll satisfy my dad before Christmas'.」
[Kashou]: 「But, as I worked through the day, I kind of started to remember the old days.」
[Kashou]: 「My desire from when I first started off to make Western sweets had resuscitated.」
ModelAnswer:
That cake was a new creation, the first taste I had, but undoubtedly it was the taste of my mentor...  
It felt nostalgic even though it was fresh.

[Kashou]: "......I feel like I came to this town just to eat this"
[Beignet]: "Did you calm down a bit?"
[Kashou]: "I don't know, but... Was I really that terrible?"
[Beignet]: "You did look like a stray cat lost in the streets"
[Kashou]: "If only out of embarrassment"
[Kashou]: "Honestly, when I was helping at the shop, there were times when I felt like doing something like this"
[Kashou]: "I need to make a cake that will convince my father by Christmas... But"
[Kashou]: "While working, I could recall the feelings from before"
[Kashou]: "The initial desire to create Western sweets has come back to me"

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
[BENIÉ]: "… I'm not Kashou's father, so I don't know. It might be possible, or it might not."
[BENIÉ]: "Sometimes even the person who says a word doesn't understand its true meaning."
[BENIÉ]: "If 100 people receive a message, there will be 100 different interpretations—that's what words are like."
[BENIÉ]: "What's important isn't the words themselves..."
[BENIÉ]: "Ah... I talked too much. Sorry."
[BENIÉ]: "You must have been tired from working all day during this long journey. It would be good to take a shower and go to bed early."
[BENIÉ]: "Oh... I was careless. There is an empty room, but the only available bed is one that Kashou used."
[BENIÉ]: "Would it be okay if we use it together?"

[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」

[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?

[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:

SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou, "Hm, if you say so..."
SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure, "If you open the window every day and don't clean off the dust, it will get musty right away."
SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou, "Is that so?"

SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou, "Ah, I see..."

[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.

[Fraise]: "You sometimes seem lost in thought..."

[Minaduki Kashou]: "It's not like it's okay to be daydreaming during work hours though."

[Fraise]: "In that case, I'll do my part and work harder."

[Fraise]: 「I never thought the two of us would reunite...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm just as surprised. You got so big that I almost didn't recognize you.」
[Fraise]: 「Did I... keep my promise to you?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, you sure did. Isn't that right, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, incredibly well. Fraise has been an excellent help to me this whole time.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... Thank you very much, Pâtissière.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise... I'm so glad for you... Sniff.」
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: "I was crying, and you... made macarons for me, big brother... huh?"
[Fraise]: "I was so happy... but I couldn't say it... before realizing the meaning of our goodbye..."
[Kashou]: "I'm sorry. By the time you came, my return home was already decided."
[Fraise]: "Big brother... to be able to reunite like this again..."
[Kashou]: "I was the one surprised. You've grown so much, I hardly recognize you anymore."
[Fraise]: "Did I keep our promise, big brother?"
[Kashou]: "Ah, of course. Right, Master?"
[Beignet]: "Yes, absolutely. Fraise has been such great help to me."
[Fraise]: "Ugh... thank you... pastry chef."
[Shigure]: "Fraise... that went well, didn't it... huh?"

[Fraise]: 「Would it be all right if I called you Onii-san again? Just like the old days?」
[Kashou]: 「Of course it would.」

[Beignet]: 「Tee hee...」

[Fraise]: "But really, it's not like that..."

[嘉祥]: 「人事みたいに言うな」

時雨が突き出したスマホには、フレーズを賞讃する言葉が並んでいた。
会いに行く、と宣言しているお客さんが何人もいる。おそらく、店の前にできた行列の中に……
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Big trouble, Onii-san! There is a line outside...!」
[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」
[Shigure]: 「This shop has always been a popular spot among those in the know, but the social media presence seems to have sparked a bigger flame.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」
[Shigure]: 「What are you even saying, Fraise? I am not the only cause here.」
[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: "It's a hassle, big brother! There's a line outside..."

[Kashou]: "Oh... The number of customers has increased since yesterday. It's like Christmas!"

[Shigure]: "This was already a well-known shop, but with SNS it caught even more fire."

[Kashou]: "Don't say it like it's a personnel issue."

[Shigure]: "I'm sorry. I didn't expect such an effect would happen here."

[Fraise]: "Shigure-san... I think you're overdoing it."

[Shigure]: "What are you talking about, Fraise? It's not just because of me."

[Shigure]: "You're also becoming a hot topic. Look! Here too, look!"

On Shigure's extended smartphone screen, there were words praising Fraise.

There were many customers declaring their intention to meet her. Perhaps among the line that had formed in front of the shop...

Question:

食後――テーブルには、珈琲が並んでいる。

reference_answer:

[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I hope you enjoy the meal.」
[Shigure]: 「I will!」
[Fraise]: 「Your cooking is always amazing, Pâtissière, but with Onii-san and Shigure-san around, you go the extra mile.」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I just can't help myself.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
Just like last night, we have a spectacular dinner.
After the meal — cups of coffee line the table.
[Beignet]: 「The shop sure was bustling today.」
[Fraise]: 「It really was. I never expected THAT many customers...」

[Beignet]: "Heh... I can't help but get excited."
[Kashou]: "Thank you very much."

Just like last night, it was an absolutely fantastic dinner.
After the meal -- there were cups of coffee lined up on the table.
[Beignet]: "Today was a huge success"
[Fraise]: "Really, it was. Having so many customers show up like that..."

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no mistake. Because it became a topic, many people investigated and because of that, it got high ratings as a famous shop. It's a synergy effect."
[Kashou]: "Personally, I'm happy that more people know about the amazing cakes made by my mentor."
[Fraise]: "Ugh... If tomorrow is like today, it might be a bit tough."
[Beignet]: "Today was special, you know."
[Beignet]: "I don't think there will be another line like today's tomorrow."
[Fraise]: "That's right... Tomorrow, it'll just be between the patissier and me again."
We were planning to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is 7 hours. To return home within the promised three days, we need that much time.
In the end, I didn't know what was lacking in myself.

It felt like it had lightened up quite a bit...

metadata:

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」
[ベニエ]: 「結局、お役に立てなかったわね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、そんなことは！」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、この場所へ来て、お店を手伝って、思い出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、やっぱり、皆を笑顔にするケーキが作りたい」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の作るケーキは、本当に美味しくて、優しい味で……皆を笑顔にしてくれるんです」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがとう。そう言ってもらえて、嬉しいわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, excuse me..."
SPEAKER_NAME: Beignet: "It seems I couldn't be of use after all."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "No, that's not it!"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Ah... well... I still don't fully understand what being a father means"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "But coming here and helping out at the shop made me realize something."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Master Beignet's cakes are really delicious, and they have a kind taste... they make everyone smile."
SPEAKER_NAME: Beignet: "...Thank you. I'm happy to hear that."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I've been overthinking things for some reason... like I forgot my initial feelings or got caught up in something else while pretending otherwise."

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」

SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you very much."

Question:

洋菓子を教えてもらうために弟子入りするのに、実家の和菓子屋が老舗だという話は、場違いな気がして避けていたのだが……
[ベニエ]: 「それは……」

下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I never thought that would happen..."
[Beignet]: "Back then, I was young and not very wise. I was chasing after many things..."
[Beignet]: "...and realizing what was most important after losing them."
[Fraise]: "Was it your family...that was the most important?"
[Beignet]: "Yeah... For me, a dessert...was something that could make my son smile."
[Beignet]: "The taste of the desserts I bake is the praise from my young son when he says they're delicious."
[Beignet]: "I keep baking them hoping that someday my son might eat them and be happy."
[Beignet]: "...That's just nostalgia, you know?"
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah... How are your family now?"
He was allowed to stay as a boarder and helped out at the shop every day. However, there had been no contact from anyone who could be considered family through phone calls or mail.

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「んしょ……」
時雨は大きめのキャリーケースを引っ張っている。けっこう重そうだ。
[嘉祥]: 「今回は飛行機で２泊だから、ほぼ１泊の旅行だろう？　ずいぶんと大荷物だな？」
[時雨]: 「女性は身だしなみに小道具がいっぱい必要なのです」
[時雨]: 「あと、このドレスと和服とで、同じ靴、同じ下着というわけにはいきませんし、部屋着も必要でしたし」
[時雨]: 「フランスの宅配便の使い方は、調べていませんでしたので」
[嘉祥]: 「あー……フランスの宅配便は、あまり頼りにしないほうがいいかな」
[時雨]: 「そ、そうなんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「個人的な経験によるが……運に左右されると思うぞ」
[時雨]: 「それは困ります……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Heave...」
Shigure pulls her rather big carry-on case. Looks pretty heavy.
[Kashou]: 「This was a two-night trip by plane, which means it was roughly a one-night stay. You're packing quite the load for such a short time.」
[Shigure]: 「A girl needs many tools to keep up appearances.」
[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I wouldn't put too much faith in getting your luggage delivered to the airport in France.」
[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Nnsho..."
Shigure is pulling a fairly large carry case. It seems quite heavy.
[Kashou]: "Since we're taking a flight for two nights this time, it's almost like a one-night trip, isn't it? Quite a lot of luggage, huh?"
[Shigure]: "Women need lots of accessories for their appearance."
[Shigure]: "Also, with this dress and the kimono, we can't use the same shoes or underwear. And we needed pajamas too."
[Shigure]: "I didn't look into how to use French delivery, so..."
[Kashou]: "Ah... I think it's better not to rely too much on French delivery."
[Shigure]: "Really?"
[Kashou]: "It's just based on my personal experience... but I think it's influenced by fate."
[Shigure]: "That's troublesome..."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨、大変なら持ってあげるから、無理をする前に言ってくれよ？」
[時雨]: 「あ……」
[時雨]: 「兄様、ちょっと変わりましたね……」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、重たい荷物を運んでいる妹を気遣うくらい、今までだってしただろ？」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou: "Shigure, if it's too heavy, I'll carry it for you, so please tell me before you strain yourself."

SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "Ah..."

SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou: "I've always been considerate of my little sister carrying loads, right?"

SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "Yes, that has changed a bit..."

SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou: "Well, I didn't think you were such an uncaring person. More like meddlesome..."

SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "That's true. Both now and before, Master is always very kind and wonderful."

SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "But in the past, I thought that if something was heavy, you'd say you'll carry it without waiting for me to ask."

SPEAKER_NAME: Kashou: "Yeah, maybe..."

SPEAKER_NAME: Shigure: "I'm really happy about that and I think I should be grateful, but now Master has entrusted me with the decision."

Question:

俺自身のことなのに、妹のほうが把握しているというのも、どうかと思うが……

[嘉祥]: 「俺は何も変わったつもりはないけれど、時雨が言うのなら、変わったのかもしれない」
ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、師匠があれだけの話をしてくれたんだ。俺だって少しは学ぶさ」
[時雨]: 「学びはありましたか？」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:

SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Oh..."
I wonder if it's strange that my sister understands me better than I do myself...
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "Not just these past few days... probably the accumulation of everyday life has changed our brother."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I don't feel like I've changed at all, but if Shigure says so, then maybe I have."
The days spent with the cats and my master's words are shaping who I am today.
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Well, Master did talk about such things. I should learn a little too."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "Did you learn anything?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I think so. I've also been thinking about why I make Western sweets."

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「結局のところ、俺は……親父に認められたいんだ」

[嘉祥]: 「すまないな、時雨……幻滅させたかな……？」

[嘉祥]: 「そうじゃなければ、親父に否定されたくらいで、こんなにも悩んだりはしないだろう」
[時雨]: 「もしかしたら、そういう気持ちはあるのかもしれません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I thought it might just be about the words, you know?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "No way! It's not just about words..."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I've been thinking deep about my own feelings, though. About what's really at the bottom of my heart."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "In the end, I guess... I want to be recognized by Dad."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "At this age, aren't I too old for this kind of rebellion?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "I'm probably just an egotist filled with a desire for approval, huh?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "Sorry, Shigure... Did I disillusion you?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "Is that why my brother is making Western sweets?"
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "If it weren't for the fact that Dad would reject me, I wouldn't be in such a dilemma."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "Maybe you do have those feelings."

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」

My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」

SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "Yes, indeed. I was hoping we could return for dinner."
The arrival of the plane was a bit delayed, and so we returned home in the evening.
Shigure also thought that the cats might still be at the shop, so she didn't go back to the Minaduki house but came with me to La Soleil.
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "This pilgrimage was quite tough, after all."
And over there, I had a lot of standing work to do.
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "I'm completely fine. Your concern is unnecessary, brother."
She smiles bravely, but the signs of fatigue are unmistakable.
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Kashou: "It'd be good to rest at home. We could even stay overnight and return tomorrow if needed."
SPEAKER_NAME: Minaduki Shigure: "Are we staying overnight?!?"

My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
